title: HP Office20 Multipurpose Paper, 8.5" x 11", 20 lbs., White, 500 Sheets/Ream, 10 Reams/Carton (HPC8511)

description.header: Keep your printer going throughout the workday with this carton of HP 8.5" x 11" office paper.
description.paragraph: Load up copiers, printers and fax machines with this HP office paper. The matte finish and bright white color lend a professional look to your documents, and the smooth construction runs through printing machines seamlessly. This HP office paper comes in a sturdy 20-pound paper weight, providing a perfect solution for printing daily reports, business forms and important memos.
bullets: Ideal for high volume printing and copying of everyday business documents

environmental.EcoID: Yes, product meets Staples criteria for environmental features to earn the Eco-ID mark. Learn more at EcoIDProgram.com
